member.name: T:AGI.Astrogator.Plugin.AgGatorConfiguredCalcObject
member.summary: Astrogator Calc object from the component browser

member.name: M:AGI.Astrogator.Plugin.AgGatorConfiguredCalcObject.Evaluate(System.Object)
member.summary: Computes the Value (in internal units) at the time indicated by the interface. The interface must support IAgGatorState.

member.name: M:AGI.Astrogator.Plugin.AgGatorConfiguredCalcObjectClass.Evaluate(System.Object)
member.summary: Computes the Value (in internal units) at the time indicated by the interface. The interface must support IAgGatorState.

member.name: T:AGI.Astrogator.Plugin.IAgGatorConfiguredCalcObject
member.summary: Astrogator Calc Object interface which computes its value. Inputs to the Calc Object are provided by the DispInterface which must support IAgGatorState.

member.name: M:AGI.Astrogator.Plugin.IAgGatorConfiguredCalcObject.Evaluate(System.Object)
member.summary: Computes the Value (in internal units) at the time indicated by the interface. The interface must support IAgGatorState.
